name: Elekid
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: It generates electricity by whirling its arms. However, it can’t store the energy it makes.

poke_power.name: Baby Evolution
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Electabuzz from your hand onto Elekid (this counts as evolving Elekid) and remove all damage counters from Elekid.

attacks.name: Outlet
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a {L} Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
